resources.string: Do you know how important Water is?
This is serious business. \n Try the quiz and see!
What is the average percentage of fresh water available on Earth?
Which of these processes are part of the water cycle?
What is the average percentage of water in the human body?
Which of these is not a function of water in our body?
Please write the chemical formula of water
Which African country is running out of water on April 2018 due to severe drought and is already rationing water supplies?
What can each one of us do to save water everyday?
The constant flow of water in nature
The water you consume and eliminate
Turn off the tap when brushing your teeth
Water your garden with a hose pipe at noon
Reduce the volume of water in the toilet cistern
Use your dishwasher with half loads
Water your plants early in the morning
Please, read more about the importance of water
You are on a good path, but you still need to learn more
You are a real water saver, and very concerned about our future. Know that we can still change things and make this world a better place
Glad to know that you care!
